column1: The family will be gathering at the Shawnee Tribe Community Building from Noon Sunday
column3: 2015 until the service at 10:00 AM on Tuesday
column5: 2015 With Reverend Geoff Buffalo officiating and Mr. Wayne Blalock providing Native American Rites. Miss Dollarhide will be laid to rest at the Peoria Tribal Cemetery east of Miami. Services are under the care of Brown-Winters Funeral Home and Cremation Service in Miami.
